SEARCH

Class ClockEngine

java.lang.Object
ClockEngine
public class ClockEngine extends Object
ASCIIADVENTURER Caden Finley Albert Tucker Grijesh Shrestha The ClockEngine class represents a timer or stopwatch that can be started and stopped. It includes methods to start the clock, stop the clock, and return the time in a formatted string.
Version:
1.0
Author:
ASCIIADVENTURERS

  • Constructor Details

    • ClockEngine

      public ClockEngine(String type)
      Constructs a ClockEngine with the specified type.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the clock engine

  • Method Details

    • startClock

      public void startClock(int periodInSeconds)
      Starts the clock with the specified period in seconds. Depending on the type of clock (timer or stopwatch), it will start the appropriate function.
      Parameters:
      periodInSeconds - the period in seconds for the clock to run

    • stopClock

      public void stopClock()
      Stops the clock by setting the running flag to false. This method can be used to halt the clock's operation.

    • returnTime

      public String returnTime()
      Returns the formatted time as a string in the format HH:MM:SS. If the hours exceed 99, it caps the hours at 99. If the minutes exceed 59, it caps the minutes at 59. If the seconds exceed 59, it caps the seconds at 59.
      Returns:
      the formatted time string

    • getTimeElapsedInSeconds

      public long getTimeElapsedInSeconds()
      Gets the time elapsed in seconds.
      Returns:
      the time elapsed in seconds

    • getRemainingTimeInSeconds

      public long getRemainingTimeInSeconds()
      Gets the remaining time in seconds.
      Returns:
      the remaining time in seconds

    • setSavedTimeInSeconds

      public void setSavedTimeInSeconds(long save)
      Sets the saved time in seconds.
      Parameters:
      save - the time to be saved in seconds

    • debugTime

      public void debugTime(long time)
      Sets the debug time in seconds.
      Parameters:
      time - the debug time to be set in seconds
